title: The Missing Lunch Money
intro:
You're sitting in the school cafeteria with your friend Kai when you notice him staring at his empty lunch tray. The lunch line is getting shorter, and most students already have their food. Kai keeps checking his pockets and looking around nervously.

'I can't find my lunch money anywhere,' Kai says quietly, running his hands through his backpack one more time. 'I know I had it this morning.' You have enough money for your own lunch plus a little extra that your mom gave you for emergencies.

checkpoints.prompt: The cashier calls out that the lunch line will close in five minutes. Kai closes his backpack and starts to get up from the table. 'I guess I'm not eating today,' he says with a shrug. You can see other students like Elena and Marcus still in line getting their food.

choices.text: Offer to buy Kai lunch with your extra money
Suggest asking the cafeteria worker if there's a way to get lunch without money today
Ask Kai if he wants to share half of whatever you get for lunch

checkpoints.prompt: While you're deciding what to do, you overhear Elena talking to her friend about finding a crumpled five-dollar bill near the water fountain earlier. She mentions she turned it in to the main office because she wasn't sure whose it was. Kai doesn't seem to have heard this conversation.

choices.text: Tell Kai what Elena said about finding money near the water fountain
Ask Elena directly about the money she found

checkpoints.prompt: The cafeteria is starting to empty out as students finish getting their lunch. You notice the main office is just down the hall from the cafeteria, and there's still about fifteen minutes left in the lunch period. Kai is gathering his things slowly, and Elena has moved to a table near the windows with her food.

choices.text: Walk with Kai to the main office to check about the lost money
Get your lunch first and then figure out the situation
Sit with Kai and eat whatever food you can share between you both

ending: The lunch period continues with students finishing their meals and cleaning up their tables. Some head outside to the playground while others stay inside to finish homework or talk with friends. The afternoon classes will start soon, and the cafeteria workers begin preparing for the next lunch shift.
